description: Try our easy to follow Spinach Carbonara with Bacon  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Carbonara,High protein,Soy free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Spinach Carbonara with Bacon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wash & dry baby leaf spinach, finely chop in a food processor.
In a bowl, whisk together spinach, ricotta & Vegeta Gourmet Stock & Seasoning Powder.
Boil spaghetti pasta in a large pot of salted water according to package instructions. Keep some water aside, drain well.
Heat a large pan, add smoked bacon and cook until crispy. Remove bacon, keep excess fat & add spinach mixture. Stir on low and add spaghetti. If needed, add a touch of pasta water.
Stir all ingredients briefly then remove from heat.
